original_text: But Peter said to Jesus, ‘I will die with you if I need to. But I will never say that I do not know you.’ All the other disciples said the same thing.
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 내가 주와 함께 죽을지언정 주를 부인하지 않겠나이다 하고 모든 제자도 그와 같이 말하니라

sentences.original_text: 'I will die with you if I need to'
But I will never say that I do not know you'
sentences.korean_translation: '하지만 나는 당신을 모른다고 말하지 않을 겁니다'

sentences.original_text: All the other disciples said the same thing
